Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Initialization|[Misc] Pause Rotation|[Misc] Pet Management|[Misc] Automatic Buffing|[Misc] Instanced Combat Detection|[Support] Auto Potion (Heroism)|[Support] Herbalism: Lifeblood|[Support] Racials|[Support] Frag Belt|[Support] Dark Soul: Knowledge|[Support] Synapse Springs|[Support] Glyph of Imp Swarm|[Support] Grimoire|[Support] Command Demon|[Support] Doomguard|[Support] Soulstone|[Support] Healthstone|[Support] Level 30 Talent|[Support] Level 45 Talent|[Support] Level 90 Talent|[Support] Dark Regeneration|[Support] Automatic Mortal Coil|Metamorphosis: Cancel|Metamorphosis: Aura of the Elements|Metamorphosis: Immolation Aura|Metamorphosis: Doom (Boss)|Metamorphosis: Doom|Metamorphosis: Doom (Focus)|Metamorphosis: Doom (Mouseover)|Metamorphosis: Carrion Swarm|Metamorphosis: Void Ray|Metamorphosis: Harvest Life|Metamorphosis|Curse of the Elements|Hand of Gul'dan|Corruption (Boss)|Corruption|Corruption (Focus)|Corruption (Mouseover)|Life Tap|Hellfire|Fel Flame
Rotation.RotationNotes:
All new Demonology Warlock Profile. Re-written from the ground up to support the immensive playstyle of the Warlock. Ready for 5.2 and beyond!
Comes ready with a Single-target, Cleave and a AoE profile for all your damaging needs.
Support: - Automatic Soulstoning of Tanks and Healers (Will require assigned roles for the moment) - Automatic Buffing - Fully automated Pet Management - Automatic Dark Regeneration - Toggle between manual or automatic Mortal Coil usage - Automatic Boss dotting - Automatic Focus dotting - Automatic Mouseover dotting .. and much much more!
Keybindings: - Pause Rotation: Right Alt - Toggle Cooldown Mode: Right Alt + Right Control - Dark Soul: Left Shift - Level 30 Talent: Left Control + Left Alt - Level 45 Talent: Right Shift - Level 90 Talent: Right Control - Doomguard / Infernal
Everything is completely configurable in-game for the ultimate custom play experience!
